## forever() function

Calls the `task` indefinitely. Note: if `task` throws, the process stops.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function forever<T>(task: AsyncTask<T>): Promise<never>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  task | [AsyncTask](./promizr.asynctask.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The task to execute until it fails |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;never&gt;
